author: davidw
msg: * src/mod_rivet.c (Rivet_SendContent): Use static objects for scripts
that are used for each request, in order to keep reusing them.

author: karl
msg: Factor the field displaying out of the showform method and put it in
showform_field soi when we override an Add or Edit method, or whatever, it

author: karl
msg: Accept arguments to the showform_prolog method of DIODisplay and pass them
through to the underlying form's start method, allowing us to pass parameters

author: karl
msg: Allow showform_prolog method to take key-value pair arguments and forward
them to the form's start method, so we can do things like name the form
and then access elements of it with javascript by name.

author: karl
msg: Allow start method to take key-value arguments that will be expressed in
